inclusion.criterion: Subject willing to participate in the study with a signed informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject being operated for a papillary thyroid cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject having had a blood test for plasma Tg levels and circulating anti-Tg antibodies in the week preceding the surgical intervention
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects presenting with thyroid cancers of non follicular origin
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and has undergone multiple treatments, including XRT. However, the patient's condition may not meet all inclusion criteria due to lack of recent blood tests for plasma Tg levels and circulating anti-Tg antibodies.
